duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting patients with creating resumes, cover letters, and reference documents.
Assisting patients with applying to college/trade/training programs.
Preparation of patients for GED test.
Running groups and meeting with patients to assist them with their vocational/educational goals.
Commute to Buffalo location once a week to assist patients at the Detox center.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Associates in a human service-related field.
Valid NYS driver’s license and reliable transportation.
